instruction: Summarize the purpose of the given song.
output: The main message of the song is that money can buy love and luxury, and that having money will bring one's dreams and goals into fruition. The song encourages people to invest their young money into achieving their dreams, and to use money as an asset rather than a liability. It speaks to the wealth of opportunities available to those who are willing to invest and take risks. The music video also reflects this as a celebration of wealth, luxury, and good health.
